meanings.definition: A unit of weight equal to 2,000 pounds.
meanings.sent1: The truck carried a ton of bricks to the construction site.
meanings.sent2: She bought a ton of groceries for the party.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally ordered a ton of bubblegum instead of regular gum.
meanings.sent4: His love for her weighed a ton on his heart.
meanings.sent5: The elephant weighed a ton, making it the heaviest animal in the zoo.

meanings.sent1: There was a ton of excitement at the concert.
meanings.sent2: He had a ton of work to finish before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The kids collected a ton of seashells at the beach.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room, adding a ton of brightness to the atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The chef used a ton of spices to enhance the flavor of the dish.
